title: [K-12] Automated Machine Learning Pipeline Implementation with Domain-Specific Scripting Languages

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning concepts, experience with Python or similar languages, foundational knowledge of linear algebra/probability theory
context.additional_context: Microlearning content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, providing hands-on tools executable in mobile settings without complex installations

learning_goals: Automated machine learning pipelines can be designed using DSL (Domain Specific Language) syntax
The optimization principles of genetic algorithms (Genetic Programming) can be explained and applied to pipeline design
Mobile-based pipeline prototypes can be implemented in constrained technical environments, and performance evaluation reports can be generated

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
